function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tightly controlled production environment may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of potential risks.","Impact":"Failure to identify and address potential risks may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough risk assessments and implement proactive measures to mitigate potential risks.","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, surveillance technologies, and sanitation systems.","People":"Podcast production team, contributors, and audience members.","Owner":"Podcast production team and management."},{"Description":"Sampling strategy targeting a particular group may limit the representation of diverse experiences and perspectives.","Impact":"Inadequate representation may lead to oversight of critical insights and risk factors related to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Diversify sampling strategies to encompass a broader range of perspectives and experiences.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, demographic analysis software, and community engagement platforms.","People":"Urban studies scholars, contributors, and audience members.","Owner":"Research team and project management."},{"Description":"Lack of generalizability in qualitative research may restrict the applicability of insights to broader contexts and populations.","Impact":"Inability to apply insights from the podcast to other built environments may result in overlooked common risk factors for contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Supplement qualitative insights with quantitative data and cross-disciplinary perspectives to enhance applicability.","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, cross-disciplinary collaboration tools, and trend analysis software.","People":"Urban studies scholars, contributors, and decision-makers in public health and urban planning.","Owner":"Research team and public health authorities."}]}
